creditline: Gift of Gordon Brodfuehrer in honor of Dr. Andreas Marks
description: abstracted image; grasses/foliage in a flat landscape waving in breeze; horizontal color waves--lavendar, orange, tan; high horizon line with apricot-colored sky, with lighter shading at horizon
inscription: bottom edge in pencil: 野分き Searing Blast 22/75
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
signed: bottom edge in pencil: Chizuko Yoshida \'93
title: Searing Blast
